gridsim.fta
Interface FailureModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
FailureFileReader
public interface FailureModel

This interface defines what a Failure model should provide. A failure model generates a list of availability/unavailability that can be happened in a resource (e.g., a PE)

Since:
GridSim Toolkit 5.0
Author:
Bahman Javadi
See Also:
FailureFileReader

          Returns a list with the jobs generated by the workload.
